protocol.name: TERVYX Protocol
protocol.description: A reproducible governance and labeling standard for health-information evidence evaluation with patent-protected methodologies

citation.title: TERVYX Protocol v1.0: A Reproducible Governance & Labeling Standard for Health-Information Evidence

patent.title: Verification of Non-scientific Health-Information Claims — GGP-based Hybrid Control

Gold.description: Strong positive evidence with high confidence

Silver.description: Moderate positive evidence with reasonable confidence

Bronze.description: Weak positive evidence with limited confidence

Black.description: Safety violations or failed quality gates

labels.PASS: Evidence meets safety and quality standards
labels.FAIL: Safety violations or severe quality issues

gate_governance_protocol.name: GGP (Gate Governance Protocol)

Phi.name: Physiological Plausibility
Phi.purpose: Detect physiological impossibilities and category misalignment

J.name: Journal-Trust Oracle
J.purpose: Assess study and journal quality with BLACK pre-masking

K.name: Safety Gate
K.purpose: Detect contraindications and serious adverse events

L.name: Language Gate
L.purpose: Detect exaggerated claims and marketing language

gate_governance_protocol.safety_first_monotonicity: Φ or K gate failures cannot be offset by high J scores

methodology.effect_size_calculation: P(effect > δ) where δ is clinical significance threshold
methodology.benefit_direction: Unified positive direction across all outcomes

data_formats.citation_format: JSON with BibTeX and DOI integration

api_usage.programmatic_access: Python package and REST API planned

quality_assurance.reproducibility: Complete audit trails and policy fingerprints
quality_assurance.validation: JSON Schema validation for all data formats

ai_integration.llm_hints: Embedded in each entry for AI interpretation
ai_integration.structured_data: JSON-LD format compatible with knowledge graphs
ai_integration.schema_validation: JSON Schema definitions for all data types
